### Classification Models:

**Linear Classification Models:**
1. Binary Logistic Regression
2. Multinomial Logistic Regression
3. Linear Discriminant Analysis (LDA)

**Tree-Based Classification Models:**
4. Decision Trees

**Nearest Neighbor-Based Models:**
5. K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN)
6. Radius Neighbors

**Support Vector Machine Variants:**
7. C-Support Vector Classification (C-SVC)
8. Nu-Support Vector Classification (Nu-SVC)
9. One-Class SVM

**Ensemble Classification Models:**
10. Random Forest
11. Extra Trees (Extremely Randomized Trees)
12. Isolation Forest
13. AdaBoost
14. Gradient Boosting Machines (GBM)
15. XGBoost
16. LightGBM
17. CatBoost
18. Voting Classifiers
19. Stacking
20. Bagging (Bootstrap Aggregating)

**Bayesian Classification Models:**
21. Naive Bayes Classifier
22. Bayesian Networks
23. Bayesian Logistic Regression
24. Bayesian Belief Network

**Other Classification Models:**
25. Gaussian Naive Bayes
26. Quadratic Discriminant Analysis (QDA)
27. RBF (Radial Basis Function) Network
28. Rocchio Classifier
